title: Most excellent lettering linkage
content:
Howdy folks,

I’ve been enjoying a steady source of enjoyable lettering and chuckling: [www.TheSuperest.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20081007160914/http:/www.thesuperest.com/ "www.TheSuperest.com")

Well worth a typophile’s visit, as is the batcave of the letterer in residence  
Kevin Cornell: [www.BearSkinRug.co.uk](http://web.archive.org/web/20081007160914/http:/www.bearskinrug.co.uk/ "www.BearSkinRug.co.uk")

Randy

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081007160914im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/k04_ringleader_4683.jpg)

author: Randy
